content.text:
# 23rd TCA Awards

The 23rd TCA Awards were presented by the Television Critics Association. John Oliver hosted the ceremony  on July 21, 2007 at the Beverly Hilton Hotel.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!width="250"|Category
!width="250"|Winner
!width="410"|Other Nominees
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Program of the Year
|align="center" | Heroes (NBC)
|
* American Idol (Fox)
* Friday Night Lights (NBC)
* Planet Earth (Discovery Channel)
* When the Levees Broke (HBO)
* The Wire (HBO)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Comedy
|align="center" | The Office (NBC)
|
* 30 Rock (NBC)
* The Daily Show with Jon Stewart (Comedy Central)
* Entourage (HBO)
* Ugly Betty (ABC)
|-
|align="center" style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Outstanding Achievement in Drama
|align="center" | The Sopranos (HBO)
|
* Friday Night Lights (NBC)
* Heroes (NBC)
* Lost (ABC)
* The Wire (HBO)
|-

* When the Levees Broke (HBO)
|-

|

* Heroes (NBC)
* Ugly Betty (ABC)

* Stephen Colbert - The Colbert Report (Comedy Central)
* America Ferrera - Ugly Betty (ABC)
* Tina Fey - 30 Rock (NBC)
* Jon Stewart - The Daily Show with Jon Stewart (Comedy Central)
|-

Mary Tyler Moore
|
